sections.heading: Investment of monies in the debt service account5-1472
sections.text: Investment of monies in the debt service accountA. The board may authorize the authority's fiscal agent to invest and reinvest any monies in the debt service account as provided by section 5-1473.B. The order directing an investment shall state

sections.heading: of monies in the debt service account
sections.text: of monies in the debt service account
